title: Start
body:
Tien: Hi! Welcome to this world
Tien: Pretty dark hah?
Tien: You can move around with W A S D
Tien: You can dash by pressing Shift but it has cool-down time
Tien: Here, you have to find the small Yellow coins right there

title: Enemies2
body: Tien: Oh no! There is another one!

title: After seeing
body:
Tien: Well, go catch it
Tien: Catching one will give you score

title: After catching
body:
Tien: Oh no, there are the Red enemies
Tien: Try not to stand in the direction that have been warning
Tien: You only have 3 life in total
Tien: Hitting enemies will cost you one

title: Enemies3
body: Tien: And ... there is another one!

title: Enemies4
body: Tien: These enemies have the red circle around, try not to hit it

title: Enemies6
body:
Tien: HaHa! Sorry about that
Tien: Now let's play
